section.title: Initial setup
section.para: The Guacamole web application uses one main configuration file called guacamole.properties which must be in the classpath of your servlet container. This file provides the hostname and port that the proxy daemon guacd is listening on, and configures the authentication method.

section.title: Authentication
section.para: Authentication is configured by editing guacamole.properties and setting the authentication provider property: auth-provider.
